trans-unit.source: You will need to perform the following steps before you scan and apply the update:
trans-unit.target: You will need to perform the following steps before you scan and apply the update:

trans-unit.source: Take a cloud snapshot of the device data.
trans-unit.target: Take a cloud snapshot of the device data.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that your controller fixed IPs are routable and can connect to the Internet.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that your controller fixed IPs are routable and can connect to the Internet.

trans-unit.source: These fixed IPs will be used to service updates to your device.
trans-unit.target: These fixed IPs will be used to service updates to your device.

trans-unit.source: You can test this by running the following cmdlet on each controller from the Windows PowerShell interface of the device:
trans-unit.target: You can test this by running the following cmdlet on each controller from the Windows PowerShell interface of the device:

trans-unit.source: Sample output for Test-Connection when fixed IPs can connect to the Internet
trans-unit.target: Sample output for Test-Connection when fixed IPs can connect to the Internet

trans-unit.source: After you have successfully completed these manual pre-checks, you can proceed to scan and install the updates.
trans-unit.target: After you have successfully completed these manual pre-checks, you can proceed to scan and install the updates.
